author: Jeffrey A. Trachtenberg
title: Perseus Books Hires Greenhill to Advise on Possible Sale
text:
Perseus Books Group, one of the largest independent U.S. publishers, is back on the market only 13 months after a deal to sell itself fell apart.
Greenhill & Co. has been hired to advise Perseus, which is owned by a private investment firm, on a possible sale. The book publisher generated $131 million in sales for the fiscal year ended June 30, according to a person familiar with the company who declined to provide additional...
